meanings.definition: Existing or occurring before in time or order.
meanings.sent1: My previous teacher was very kind and helpful.
meanings.sent2: The previous chapter of the book was very exciting.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally wore my previous day's socks to school!
meanings.sent4: The previous generations laid the foundation for our success.
meanings.sent5: The previous owner of the house left behind a hidden treasure.

meanings.definition: Coming before in time or order.
meanings.sent1: The previous guests left the hotel room in a mess.
meanings.sent2: She always reads the previous day's newspaper in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The previous record for the race was broken by a young athlete.
meanings.sent4: The previous decision made by the committee was overturned.
meanings.sent5: The previous winner of the competition gave a speech at the event.
